CATE Estimation

Structs and methods to estimate the ITE/CATE via metalearning

CausalELM.Metalearners — Module

Metalearners to estimate the conditional average treatment effect (CATE).

source
CausalELM.Metalearners.Metalearner — Type

Abstract type for metalearners

source
CausalELM.Metalearners.SLearner — Type

S-Learner for CATE estimation.

source
CausalELM.Metalearners.TLearner — Type

T-Learner for CATE estimation.

source
CausalELM.Metalearners.XLearner — Type

X-Learner for CATE estimation.
